Title: Heathers
Actors: Winona Ryder, Christian Slater, Shannen Doherty, Lisanne Falk
Plot: At Westerburg High where cliques rule, jerk jocks dominate and the most popular girls are all named Heather, it's going to take a Veronica and the mysterious and possibly psychotic new kid J.D. to give teen angst a body count.
